fields.name: 📜 Step 1: Read and Accept the Rules
fields.value: Visit the <#558289444927700992> channel and read through the rules. When you've read them all, and you're ready to follow them during your time in Compulsion, add a reaction to the bottom and then come back here to do the next step.

fields.name: 🔗 Step 2: Link Your Battle.net Account
fields.value:
Run the command below to authorize Jeeves to access your WoW characters:
```
/authorize
```
✅ This is secure and only allows Jeeves to read your character data.

fields.name: 🧝‍♀️ Step 3: Set Your Main Character
fields.value:
Once your characters are synced, run:
```
/characters set-main
```
🎯 Select your main toon from the dropdown menu. This helps us know who you’re raiding or pushing keys with!

fields.name: 🧙‍♂️ Step 4: Register Your Alts
fields.value:
Jeeves automatically syncs all your characters, but you can manage visibility:

• `/characters view` – See your synced characters
• `/characters hide` – Hide any alts you don’t want visible
• `/characters ignore` – Remove a character entirely from tracking

fields.name: 💡 Helpful Tips
fields.value:
🔄 You can change your main anytime by re-running `/characters set-main`
🔄 Update your roles & professions by running `/roles update`
👀 Use `/characters view` to see your synced characters
❓ Need help? Send us a message in <#1401394945901989898> or contact an @Officer

title: 📌 Compulsion  Rules and Character Registration
description: Welcome adventurers🧙‍♂️ ! Compulsion is excited to have you join us for some incredible experiences. To get started, please do the following tasks to get yourself ready to roll.

footer.text: Thanks for keeping your info up to date! Let’s keep Compulsion strong 💪 and organized 🧙‍♂️.
